result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Transcript of sentencing hearing held on 08-13-15. Original transcript is on file in case no: 15 CF 5.
Copy of transcript of sentencing hearing mailed to Registrar at Dodge Correctional Institution.

Defendant in custody.
State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to a charge of OWI - 8th offense in 15 CF 5.  Motion granted.
$150.00 cash bail transferred to 15 CF 5 and applied to fine and costs.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Shannon L. MOTT
Current: 410 Green Meadow Drive, Apt. 26, Reedsville, WI 54230 United States  (Effective: 05-26-2015)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States

$150.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
Court amends defendant's bail to $150.00 cash with the condition that defendant must report daily to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department by 6:00 p.m.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 06-25-15 at 11:00 a.m.   State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.   
Amended Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.  Copy filed.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 05-20-15 at 2:00 p.m.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of felony bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 05-18-15 at 2:30 p.m. Bail is set at $300.00 cash bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and maintain absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol.   Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
